data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
PAT stands for PHP Array Tools. The module gives the users certain
    array functionality that is built into PHP. I will eventually like
    to make it mimic all of PHP's builtin array functions, but for
    starters it has some good ones. Having programmed in Perl and PHP, I
    learned how useful it was having PHP's builtin funtions and I
    thought I would try to give the same functionality to Perl. I have
    kept the names of the functions and how you pass parameters the same
    so seasoned PHP programmers will feel right at home.
